Question.Subject: does leaving the internet running use up download time?
Question.Content: When you leave your internet running without downloading, does it use up download time?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Yep,It'll use up your download time.Don't worry about your question.It's completely all right.Even I had the same doubt. :-) I suggest you got an unlimited download plan.It rocks. Hope I helped :)

Answer.Content:
anyways am not gonna make fun of u for ur ignorance..afterall we are all human.. yes u r rite..it will use up ur download time..
i hope i've helped u :)
Yep,It'll use up your download time.Don't worry about your question.It's completely all right.Even I had the same doubt. :-) I suggest you got an unlimited download plan.It rocks. Hope I helped :)
